fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Invite: During the day, invite a player to the podcast. You open a chat with them the following night.
- Hawk Tuah: At night, execute your guest, dealing an unstoppable attack to them. (1 use).

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Players on the podcast are roleblocked through immunity, similar to being jailed. They can still be visited, though.
- Your guest will know who you are.
- You will know who your guest visited on a random previous night (because they tell you a story for the podcast content).
- You know what night the info is from.
